caption:
In this photograph, we see an urban street scene capturing a variety of elements and activities. On the left side of the image, an elderly man with balding hair, wearing glasses and a red and black checked shirt, is watering plants with a hose. He is bent over slightly, focused on his task.

The setting appears to be a small, enclosed garden area surrounded by a low, black metal fence and lush with green shrubbery and some scattered yellow flowers. The garden provides a small patch of nature amidst the urban environment.

In the background, to the right, there is a tall vertical sign reading "PARK HERE" in red and white, indicating the presence of a parking lot. The sign also lists the parking rates and suggests it has a cashier lift. This part of the street also includes other pedestrians further away; a few individuals observed from behind appear to be walking or standing, engaged in various activities. 

The photograph gives a view along the sidewalk extending beyond the garden, lined with the side of buildings that have a somewhat dated architectural style. There is a slight sense of activity and movement suggested by the distant pedestrians, contrasting with the calm, focused activity of the man watering the plants in the foreground.
title: Al conly waters garden plot in front of his house on east 30th street
